definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Mordo takes his power and says there's too many sorcerers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 莫度奪走了潘伯恩的法力，說世界上的魔法師太多了。

sentences.english: Shackle Undead now costs 9% of base mana.
sentences.chinese: 束縛亡靈現在消耗9%的基礎法力值。

sentences.english: Play this ability as a mana source.
sentences.chinese: 將此異能視爲魔法力源使用。

sentences.english: Orb of Annihilation mana cost increased to 25 from 20.
sentences.chinese: 毀滅之球的法力消耗從20提高到25。

sentences.english: Reduced base mana per level to 64 from 78.
sentences.chinese: 每級增加的基本魔法力從78點減少到64點。

sentences.english: Mana Vault does not untap during your untap phase.
sentences.chinese: 魔法力庫不可在你的重置階段中重置。

sentences.english: Finally, Prasong kill friction dove, learned all his mana.
sentences.chinese: 最後，巴頌殺死摩鳩，吸取了他全部法力。

sentences.english: Many creatures within the Mana Tombs have been slightly retuned .
sentences.chinese: 在法力墳墓中的很多生物被小幅調整。

sentences.english: I'll be always loyal to you.
sentences.chinese: 他們會拜服在你的法力下。

sentences.english: Holy paladins will use spirit as their mana regeneration stat.
sentences.chinese: 神聖聖騎士們將使用精神作爲他們的法力恢復屬性。

sentences.english: There are limits to even the strongest placebo effect.
sentences.chinese: 甚至法力最強的安慰劑效應也是有極限的。

sentences.english: Arcane Brilliance now costs 26% of base mana, down from 31% of base mana.
sentences.chinese: 祕法光輝的法力消耗從31%下降至26%基礎法力。

sentences.english: Arcane Brilliance now costs 26% of base mana, down from 31% of base mana.
sentences.chinese: 祕法光輝的法力消耗從31%下降至26%基礎法力。

sentences.english: This form venerates Avalokitesvara who protects sentient beings from harm by all snakes, scorpions and their venom.
sentences.chinese: 此菩薩化身頌揚觀音保護衆生不受毒物傷害之法力。

sentences.english: Finally it was Buddha himself, in his infinite power and wisdom was able to tell them apart.
sentences.chinese: 最後還是法力無邊的如來佛辨出了真僞。

sentences.english: The witch lost her powers with the setting of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 日頭落山後，神巫掉去了法力。

definition: occult force/the power of a God or spirit
skills acquired through religious practice/(fig.) ability/skill/Taiwan pr. [dao4 hang5]
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
